question: Where is the headquarters of Indian Council of Forestry Research and Education (ICFRE)?<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"></sup>
explanation: The Indian Council of Forestry Research and Education (ICFRE) <sup id=\"cite_ref-1\" class=\"reference\"></sup><sup id=\"cite_ref-envfor.nic.in_2-0\" class=\"reference\"></sup><sup id=\"cite_ref-3\" class=\"reference\"></sup>is an autonomous organisation under the Ministry of Environment and Forests of government of India. It is headquartered in Dehradun.
